bg-color.description: The background color of the left node can be customized through the slot content
bg-color.description_zh: 左边节点的背景颜色，一般通过slot内容自定义背景颜色即可

node-top.description: The top value of the absolute positioning of the icon on the left side of the node, in rpx
node-top.description_zh: 节点左边图标绝对定位的top值，单位rpx
